## How You Can Get Started

Visual Studio subscribers can access Azure Dev/Test pricing through one of three paths:

- [**Enterprise Dev/Test**](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/offers/ms-azr-0148p/): available to organizations with an **Enterprise Agreement (EA)**. This option provides centralized billing and the broadest management capabilities for teams running multiple non-production environments.
- [**Pay-As-You-Go Dev/Test**](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/offers/ms-azr-0023p/): ideal for **individual developers or small teams** with **Visual Studio Professional or Enterprise subscriptions** who are **not covered under an Enterprise Agreement**.

Each path unlocks the same Dev/Test discounts already included with your Visual Studio subscription, helping you run Windows and SQL Server workloads in Azure at significantly reduced rates for development and testing.
